name: Gdrive-Mirror-bot-Heroku
description: This is a telegram bot writen in python for mirroring files on the internet to our beloved Google Drive.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather

API_ID.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org DO NOT put this in quotes.

API_HASH.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org

SESSION_STRING.description: Session string generated by running python3 generate_string_session.py

OWNER_ID.description: The Telegram user ID (not username) of the owner of the bot

AUTH_CHATS.description: chat ids which you wanted to authorize

SECRET_JSON.description: Get it by running python3 generate_drive_token.py
